author: Stan Schroeder
description: Or, if you must, shrink the 9.7-inch iPad to the mini's dimensions.
title: Apple, please don't kill the iPad mini

author: Roberto Baldwin
description: The Mercedes Benz S-Class is inching closer to full autonomy.
title: Mercedes-Benz is building cars that know the road better than you do

author: Gerry Smith
description: To fend off Netflix, Time Warner Inc. is taking a page from the streaming-video giant. And itâ€™s turning to a 6-foot-8-inch former basketball player and war refugee to make it work.
title: How Time Warner Is Trying to Fend Off Netflix

author: Paul Lilly
description: This is shaping up to be an interesting summer. In addition to the ongoing CPU war between AMD and Intel, and a GPU showdown between AMD and NVIDIA, we're going to witness a mobile computing scuffle between Apple and Microsoft. This will take place starting in June when Apple will reportedly introduce upgraded 12-inch MacBook and MacPro laptops
title: Apple Plans MacBook And MacBook Pro Kaby Lake Refresh For WWDC| HotHardware

author: Micah Singleton
description: Late last year, we showed you the Arc Hub, a circular USB-C hub we hoped would help improve the pitiful plight of third-party USB-C hubs currently on the market. After owning a 12-inch MacBook for...
title: The Arc Hub is the best USB-C hub for right now
